snippet.title: A.S.P. Air Strike Patrol (Desert Fighter) (SNES) PREVIEW/QUICKPLAY NO COMMENTARY HD 1080p
snippet.description:
This is first 10 minutes of A.S.P. Air Strike Patrol (Desert Fighter) for Super Nintendo/SNES

If you like and enjoy our video you can buy us a coffee.
https://ko-fi.com/kawaiigames

A.S.P. Air Strike Patrol (known as Desert Fighter in Europe and Desert Fighter: Suna no Arashi Sakusen (デザートファイター：砂の嵐作戦) in Japan) is an isometric shoot 'em up developed by Japanese studio Opus and published by SETA for the SNES.

The game is based somewhat upon the Gulf War. As a pilot in the Air Strike Patrol, the player's aim is to stop Zarak (Iraq) from invading Sweit (Kuwait).

The player gains points for judgement in managing resources, attack power and political sensitivity. The total of these determines which text is displayed when the game is finished. The dogfights make the game more diverse and the cheat options e.g. ability to destroy buildings with the chain gun give variety. Lots of optional targets to destroy on the open map too but take too long and you fail the mission. 

Follow KAWAII GAMES here:
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/kawaiigamesie
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/3vYPZRt
DLive: https://dlive.tv/KawaiiGames
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/dundovicanamarija/
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/thekawaiigames/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/namaria7

Your support means the world to us, thank you so much:
PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/kawaiigamesie
DONATIONS: https://streamlabs.com/kawaiigamesie
